GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Exchange ActiveSync), Neo Reader Barcode Scanner

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports eAAC+, MP3, WAV, MIDI
Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: 3D Surround Sound, Clear Audio+, xLOUD, Clear Bass, Clear Phase, Clear Stereo, WALKMAN Application, Noise Suppression, TrackID
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports MP4, 3GPP, H.264, H.263, HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus, Geo-tagging, Touch Focus, Image Stabilization, HDR, Sweep Panorama, Exmor RS, Face Detection, Red-eye Reduction, Quick Launch, Self-timer, Send to Web, Smile Shutter, Touch Capture, Fast Capture

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (OPP 1.1, A2DP 1.2, GAPC, HFP 1.6, FTP 1.1, HIDP 1.0, AVRCP 1.3, LE, HSP 1.2, PANP 1.0, DUN 1.1)

Other Features.Important Apps: Google Play, Google Voice Search, Twitter, Google Talk, Facebook, YouTube, Multiple Instant Messaging, Bookmarks, Google, Friends Application, Video Chat, Gmail, Sony Music App, Sony LIV App
Other Features.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, eCompass, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Magnetometer

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Auto Rotation, Handwriting Recognition, Scratch Resistant, Backlit, 4 Points Multi-touch, Touch Panel Cover Glass, Gesture Input

Platform.OS: Android v4.2 (Jelly Bean), Upgradable to v4.3 (Jelly Bean)
Platform.Processor: 1 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4 Pro, Dual Core
